import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.gridspec as gridspec

award = pd.read_csv('../input/mlb-player-digital-engagement-forecasting/awards.csv')
player = pd.read_csv('../input/mlb-player-digital-engagement-forecasting/players.csv')
team = pd.read_csv('../input/mlb-player-digital-engagement-forecasting/teams.csv')

import matplotlib.font_manager as fm
font = fm.FontProperties(fname='../input/staatfont/Staatliches-Regular.ttf')
source.29de12ee:
A_west = team[team['divisionName'] =='American League West'].name.to_list()
A_east = team[team['divisionName'] =='American League East'].name.to_list()
A_cen = team[team['divisionName'] =='American League Central'].name.to_list()

N_west = team[team['divisionName'] =='National League West'].name.to_list()
N_east = team[team['divisionName'] =='National League Central'].name.to_list()
N_cen = team[team['divisionName'] =='National League East'].name.to_list()

fig = plt.figure(figsize=(20,22))

plt.text(s='American League West', x=0.25,y=0.9,va='center',ha='center',font=font,fontsize=30,alpha=0.3)
for i in range(len(A_west)):
    plt.text(s=A_west[i],x=0.25,y=0.85 - 0.05*i, va='center',ha='center',font=font,fontsize=25)
plt.text(s='American League East', x=0.25,y=0.6,va='center',ha='center',font=font,fontsize=30,alpha=0.3)
for i in range(len(A_cen)):
    plt.text(s=A_cen[i],x=0.25,y=0.55 - 0.05*i, va='center',ha='center',font=font,fontsize=25)
plt.text(s='American League Central', x=0.25,y=0.3,va='center',ha='center',font=font,fontsize=30,alpha=0.3)
for i in range(len(A_east)):
    plt.text(s=A_east[i],x=0.25,y=0.25 - 0.05*i, va='center',ha='center',font=font,fontsize=25)
    
plt.text(s='National League West', x=0.75,y=0.9,va='center',ha='center',font=font,fontsize=30,alpha=0.3)
for i in range(len(N_west)):
    plt.text(s=N_west[i],x=0.75,y=0.85 - 0.05*i, va='center',ha='center',font=font,fontsize=25)
plt.text(s='National League Central', x=0.75,y=0.6,va='center',ha='center',font=font,fontsize=30,alpha=0.3)
for i in range(len(N_cen)):
    plt.text(s=N_cen[i],x=0.75,y=0.55 - 0.05*i, va='center',ha='center',font=font,fontsize=25)
plt.text(s='National League East', x=0.75,y=0.3,va='center',ha='center',font=font,fontsize=30,alpha=0.3)
for i in range(len(N_east)):
    plt.text(s=N_east[i],x=0.75,y=0.25 - 0.05*i, va='center',ha='center',font=font,fontsize=25)


plt.text(s='MLB League',x=0.5,y=0.95, font=font,fontsize=50,va='center',ha='center')
plt.axvspan(0, 0.5, fc="lightcoral", alpha=0.2)
plt.axvspan(0.5, 1, fc="red", alpha=0.2)
plt.axis('off')

plt.show()
source.90b1b53d:
fig = plt.figure(figsize=(20,10),facecolor='whitesmoke')
ax = plt.axes()
sns.histplot(player['heightInches'],element ='poly',binwidth=1,color='pink',alpha=0.5)
plt.text(s='Mean value', x=73,y=300,fontsize=15,va='center',ha='center',color='tomato')
plt.axvline(73,linestyle ='--',color='tomato')

plt.text(s='Median value', x=74,y=350,fontsize=15,va='center',ha='center',color='tomato')
plt.axvline(74,linestyle ='--',color='tomato')

plt.text(s="This is player's Average of height",x = 66, y=400,font=font,fontsize=50)

plt.gca().spines['right'].set_visible(False)
plt.gca().spines['top'].set_visible(False)
ax.set(facecolor = "whitesmoke")

plt.xticks(font=font, fontsize=18)
plt.yticks(font=font, fontsize=18)
plt.xlabel('Height', font = font, fontsize=20)
plt.ylabel('')


plt.show()
source.59a66fe5:
mean_value = [player[player['primaryPositionName'] =='Pitcher']['heightInches'].describe()['mean'],
             player[player['primaryPositionName'] =='Outfielder']['heightInches'].describe()['mean'],
             player[player['primaryPositionName'] =='Catcher']['heightInches'].describe()['mean'],
             player[player['primaryPositionName'] =='Second Base']['heightInches'].describe()['mean'],
             player[player['primaryPositionName'] =='First Base']['heightInches'].describe()['mean'],
             player[player['primaryPositionName'] =='Shortstop']['heightInches'].describe()['mean'],
             player[player['primaryPositionName'] =='Third Base']['heightInches'].describe()['mean']]

position = ['Pitcher', 'Outfielder', 'Catcher', 'Second Base', 'First Base',
       'Shortstop', 'Third Base']

fig,axes = plt.subplots(nrows=7, ncols = 1,sharex=True,figsize=(20,25),facecolor='whitesmoke')

sns.histplot(x= player[player['primaryPositionName'] =='Pitcher']['heightInches'],element ='poly',binwidth=1,ax=axes[0],color='pink')
axes[0].text(s='Pitcher',x=80,y=200,font=font,fontsize=25,va='center',ha='center')
axes[0].text(s='Mean value', x=mean_value[0],y=200,fontsize=15,va='center',ha='center',color='tomato')
axes[0].axvline(mean_value[0],linestyle ='--',color='tomato')
axes[0].set(facecolor = "whitesmoke")

sns.histplot(x= player[player['primaryPositionName'] =='Outfielder']['heightInches'],element ='poly',binwidth=1,ax=axes[1],color='brown')
axes[1].text(s='Outfielder',x=80,y=50,font=font,fontsize=25,va='center',ha='center')
axes[1].text(s='Mean value', x=mean_value[1],y=50,fontsize=15,va='center',ha='center',color='tomato')
axes[1].axvline(mean_value[1],linestyle ='--',color='tomato')
axes[1].set(facecolor = "whitesmoke")

sns.histplot(x= player[player['primaryPositionName'] =='Catcher']['heightInches'],element ='poly',binwidth=1,ax=axes[2],color='salmon')
axes[2].text(s='Catcher',x=80,y=25,font=font,fontsize=25,va='center',ha='center')
axes[2].text(s='Mean value', x=mean_value[2],y=25,fontsize=15,va='center',ha='center',color='tomato')
axes[2].axvline(mean_value[2],linestyle ='--',color='tomato')
axes[2].set(facecolor = "whitesmoke")

sns.histplot(x= player[player['primaryPositionName'] =='Second Base']['heightInches'],element ='poly',binwidth=1,ax=axes[3],color='orange')
axes[3].text(s='Second Base',x=80,y=20,font=font,fontsize=25,va='center',ha='center')
axes[3].text(s='Mean value', x=mean_value[3],y=20,fontsize=15,va='center',ha='center',color='tomato')
axes[3].axvline(mean_value[3],linestyle ='--',color='tomato')
axes[3].set(facecolor = "whitesmoke")

sns.histplot(x= player[player['primaryPositionName'] =='First Base']['heightInches'],element ='poly',binwidth=1,ax=axes[4],color='sienna')
axes[4].text(s='First Base',x=80,y=15,font=font,fontsize=25,va='center',ha='center')
axes[4].text(s='Mean value', x=mean_value[4],y=15,fontsize=15,va='center',ha='center',color='tomato')
axes[4].axvline(mean_value[4],linestyle ='--',color='tomato')
axes[4].set(facecolor = "whitesmoke")

sns.histplot(x= player[player['primaryPositionName'] =='Shortstop']['heightInches'],element ='poly',binwidth=1,ax=axes[5],color='sandybrown')
axes[5].text(s='Shortstop',x=80,y=15,font=font,fontsize=25,va='center',ha='center')
axes[5].text(s='Mean value', x=mean_value[5],y=15,fontsize=15,va='center',ha='center',color='tomato')
axes[5].axvline(mean_value[5],linestyle ='--',color='tomato')
axes[5].set(facecolor = "whitesmoke")

sns.histplot(x= player[player['primaryPositionName'] =='Third Base']['heightInches'],element ='poly',binwidth=1,ax=axes[6],color='peru')
axes[6].text(s='Third Base',x=80,y=10,font=font,fontsize=25,va='center',ha='center')
axes[6].text(s='Mean value', x=mean_value[6],y=10,fontsize=15,va='center',ha='center',color='tomato')
axes[6].axvline(mean_value[6],linestyle ='--',color='tomato')
axes[6].set(facecolor = "whitesmoke")
plt.show()

             player[player['primaryPositionName'] =='Outfielder']['heightInches'].describe()['mean'],

source.e0c189bd:
player['Birth_year'] = player['DOB'].apply(lambda x : x.split('-')[0])
player['Birth_year'] = pd.to_numeric(player['Birth_year'])

weight_year = pd.DataFrame(player.groupby('Birth_year')['weight'].mean()).reset_index()
fig = plt.figure(figsize=(20,13),facecolor='whitesmoke')
ax = plt.axes()
plt.plot(weight_year['Birth_year'],weight_year['weight'],lw=8,color='pink')
plt.gca().spines['right'].set_visible(False)
plt.gca().spines['top'].set_visible(False)
ax.set(facecolor = "whitesmoke")

plt.xticks(font=font, fontsize=18)
plt.yticks(font=font, fontsize=18)
plt.xlabel('Year - Birth of year', font = font, fontsize=20)
plt.ylabel('Weight')

plt.text(s='The relationship with player\' Weight and age', x=1972, y=245,font=font, fontsize=50)
plt.show()
source.7504023a:
birth_position = pd.DataFrame(player.groupby('primaryPositionName')['Birth_year'].mean()).reset_index()
birth_position = birth_position.drop([1,3]).reset_index(drop=True)
birth_position['tmp_y'] =0

fig = plt.figure(figsize=(15,10))
plt.axhline(0,color='pink',lw=8,zorder=1)
plt.scatter( x=birth_position['Birth_year'], y=birth_position['tmp_y'],s=300,zorder=2)
plt.axis('off')
plt.text(s='First Base : 1990.21', x=1990.1, y=0.01,font=font, fontsize=25)
plt.text(s='Catcher : 1990.24', x=1990.2, y=-0.01,font=font, fontsize=25)
plt.text(s='Third Base : 1990.73', x=1990.73, y=0.01,font=font, fontsize=25)
plt.text(s='Pitcher : 1991.14', x=1991., y=-0.01,font=font, fontsize=25)
plt.text(s='Second Base : 1991.43', x=1991.43, y=0.01,font=font, fontsize=25)
plt.text(s='Outfielder : 1991.46', x=1991.46, y=-0.01,font=font, fontsize=25)
plt.text(s='Shortstop : 1992.34', x=1992.2, y=-0.01,font=font, fontsize=25)

plt.text(s='The average of Birth year', x=1990.15, y=0.03,font=font, fontsize=50)


fig.show()
source.dc0633fd:
def highlight_max(s):
    '''
    highlight the maximum in a Series yellow.
    '''
    is_max = s == s.max()
    return ['background-color: yellow' if v else '' for v in is_max]

com_value = pd.concat([pd.DataFrame(mean_value),pd.DataFrame(mean_value2)],axis=1)
com_value['position'] = position
com_value.columns =['Height','Weight','Position']
com_value = com_value[['Position','Height','Weight']]
com_value.set_index('Position').style.apply(highlight_max)
source.17453903:
award_player = pd.DataFrame(award['playerName'].value_counts()[:10]).reset_index()
fig = plt.figure(figsize=(23,13),facecolor='whitesmoke')
sns.barplot(data= award_player, y='index',x='playerName',palette='dark:salmon_r',alpha=0.3)
plt.axis('off')

plt.text(s="awarded Player - Counts",x=0, y=-0.8,font=font,fontsize=50)

for i in range(len(award_player)):
    plt.text(s=award_player['index'][i],x=award_player['playerName'][i]-1,y=i,va='center',ha='right',font=font,fontsize=30)
    plt.text(s=award_player['playerName'][i],x=award_player['playerName'][i]+1,y=i,va='center',ha='left',font=font,fontsize=30)


plt.show()
